Kuba
Κούβα
쿠바
boardgame.description: Game description from the publisher:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Cuba prior to the revolution: Under turbulent circumstances, the villages of the island strive for independent wealth and influence. Who can buy and sell his products and goods on the domestic market profitably or take in the most on the trading ships? Who can send the right delegate to parliament in order to influence the government legislative process, or erect distilleries, hotels and banks at the right moment to the benefit of his village?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Whoever has accumulated the most victory points in Cuba by the end of the game wins. Players earn victory points by shipping merchandise from the harbor, but also by erecting and using buildings, and by abiding by the law._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Rio Grande Games (RIO 340) Type: Economic Number of players: 2-5 Age of players: 12+ Length: 75-120 minutes Game Description: Cuba prior to the revolution: Under turbulent circumstances, the villages of the island strive for independent wealth and influence.Who can buy and sell his products and goods on the domestic market profitably or take in the most on the trading ships?Who can send the right delegate to parliament in order to influence the government legislative process, or erect distilleries, hotels and banks at the right moment to the benefit of his village?Whoever has accumulated the most victory points at the end of the game, wins. Players earn victory points by shipping merchandise from the harbor, but also by erecting and using buildings, and by abiding by the law. Author: Michael Rieneck _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Stefan Stadler

Condition notes: Cuba -- Like new. Opened and played twice. All components present and in excellent condition. (This is a beautifully produced game.) ------------------------------------------------ I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m in the process of cleaning out the game cabinet. Look back for more deals later. For open and played games, expect prices below what you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;d pay at an online discounter. Shipping: I will ship most games USPS Priority Mail using a flat rate box plus Shipping Confirmation - Estimated Actual Cost: $10.45. I will make every attempt to get you the cheapest and most timely shipping possible. All games come from a non-smoking, careful environment. I hope you enjoy owning and playing these games as much as I have. I accept Paypal or Money Order or Cashiers Check. I do not accept personal checks because I can_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t ship your game quickly with that payment method. Currently only shipping to the U.S. If you are in a foreign country and really want one of these games, contact me and I will try to accommodate you - be aware that international shipping costs may be substantially higher.

Played once, everything as new. In addition to the full game, I include 4 double-sided laminated sheets showing all the buildings. And home-made versions of Samba School, Hazienda, Canadian Embassy, and Spielecafé - they_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re nicely mounted on mountboard and sprayed with satin finish. I also include tuckboxes for all the cards, and the cool tuckbox for the run bottles. The game is very close to 2kg, which means it might be necessary to split some stuff out into a separate package. Thus please treat the non-UK prices as likely, but not guaranteed.
Weight inc packing 2000g UK Parcel Post £6 Surface Worldwide £13.17 Europe Airmail £12.29 USA Airmail £24.26 Shipping costs shown are for an individual game. I will combine shipping as best I can. Large packages (5kg, say 6 games) are very cost-effective to ship internationally via DHL. Ask if you want a detailed price.

Cuba (Eggertspiele), special wooden box edition, Limitierte Edition in der Holzkiste, 2,3 Kg Condition/Zustand: new and unused / neu und unbenutzt General Information: I sell this item as a private seller. I can not give any guarantees or refunds. Nevertheless as a board game collector I describe the item as accurate as possible. In case of missing tiles or damages I mention this in the item description. Diesen Artikel verkaufe ich als Privatperson. Eine Garantie oder eine Ruecknahme biete ich nicht an. Als Sammler von Brettspielen achte ich jedoch sehr genau auf den Zustand und auf die Vollzaehligkeit. Die Spiele sind daher meistens tadellos erhalten. Sollten Maengel vorhanden sein, werden diese auch in der Beschreibung unter _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Condition/Zustand_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; erwaehnt. Ich versende Spiele in folgende Länder: / I ship board games and board game expansions to the following countries: In case you live in a different country please contact me before you buy an item. Shipping/Versand nach Deutschland (ohne Inseln): Maxibrief (unversichert): EUR 2,20 Hermes-Paket(max. 50 cm laengste + kuerzeste Seite): EUR 4,50 DHL-Paket (versichert): 0 - 10 Kg EUR 6,00 10 - 20 Kg EUR 11,00 ------------------------------------------------------------ to Europe (EU): Belgium, Denmark, Finland, France, Greece, Great Britain, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, The Netherlands, Österreich, Poland, Portugal, Sweden, Slovakia, Spain, Czech: Registered Letter: 0 - 0.5 Kg EUR 5,50 0.5 - 1 Kg EUR 9,05 Small Parcel / Paeckchen (without insurance, max. weight 2 Kg and max. length of all 3 sides 90 cm): EUR 10,90 DHL Parcel/DHL Paket: 0 - 5 Kg EUR 17,00 5 - 10 Kg EUR 22,00 10 - 20 Kg EUR 32,00 ------------------------------------------------------------ to Switzerland, Norway, Hungary, Slovenia, Croatia and Rest of Europe: Registered Letter: 0 - 0.5 Kg EUR 5,50 0.5 - 1 Kg EUR 9,05 Small Parcel (without insurance, max. weight 2 Kg and max. length of all 3 sides 90 cm): EUR 17,90 DHL Parcel/DHL Paket: 0 - 5 Kg EUR 30,00 5 - 10 Kg EUR 35,00 10 - 20 Kg EUR 45,00 ------------------------------------------------------------ to the U.S.A. and Canada: Registered Letter (Air Mail): 0 - 0.5 Kg EUR 5.50 0.5 - 1 Kg EUR 9.05 Small Parcel (without insurance, max. weight 2 Kg and max. length of all 3 sides 90 cm): EUR 17.90 DHL Parcel: 0 - 5 Kg EUR 36.00 5 - 10 Kg EUR 47.00 10 - 20 Kg EUR 68.00 ------------------------------------------------------------ to Australia, Brazil, Japan, New Zealand: Registered Letter (Air Mail): 0 - 0.5 Kg EUR 5.50 0.5 - 1 Kg EUR 9.05 Small parcel (without insurance, max. weight 2 Kg and max. length of all 3 sides 90 cm): EUR 17.90 DHL Parcel: 0 - 5 Kg EUR 42.00 5 - 10 Kg EUR 59.00 10 - 20 Kg EUR 91.00 ------------------------------------------------------------ Payment: Überweisung/bank transfer via IBAN + BIC PayPal Money Bookers (Skrill)

Brand new, factory sealed. Shipping is only actual postage, and I use Priority _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Regional Rate_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; boxes to save $$$ if you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re not too far from MN. *MUST READ* PAYMENT INFO: I take USPS Money Orders or well-concealed cash. I accept standard Paypal _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Goods Purchase_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; payments. If you make a regular Paypal payment, your grand total will be enough to make me _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;whole_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; after Paypal takes their fees out, which are $0.30 + 2.9% of the full payment amount. I also am happy to take ZERO-FEE _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Personal_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; PAYPAL payments that use a bank account or your existing Paypal balance as the payment source (NOT a credit card, unless you pick the option to pay the fees yourselves) for the exact sale price plus exact postage. Sending a _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Personal_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; Paypal payment means you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll be trusting your seller (i.e. me), which is no different than the way every mail order transaction EVER worked prior to 1998 or so. Players earn victory points by shipping merchandise from the harbor, but also by erecting and using buildings, and by abiding by the law.

Description: Come to Cuba, prior to the revolution: Who can buy and sell his products and goods on the domestic market profitably or take in the most on the trading ships? Who can send the right delegate to parliament in order to influence the government_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s legislative process, or erect distilleries, hotels and banks at the right moment to benefit of his village? Whoever has accumulated the most victory points at the end of the game, wins. Players earn victory points by shipping merchandise from the harbor, but also by erecting and using buildings, and by abiding by the law.
Components: 1 gameboard 5 individual plantation boards 25 character cards, 5 each in 5 different playing colors 15 ship cards 1 starting player card with a plastic stand 24 small statute cards 25 building tiles 1 voting tile 1 veto tile 5 playing pieces, in 5 different playing colors 5 playing markers, in 5 different playing colors 54 product pieces, 18 each of 3 different types 30 goods pieces, 15 each of 2 different types 45 resource pieces, 15 each of 3 different types 60 coins in various denominations 6 black marking pieces 4 short rules sheets 1 rulebook ****************************** Our Philosophy: We are not satisfied unless you are satisfied! It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s that simple. In business for over 5 years, we understand the most critical aspects of ecommerce. Deliver good value, keep you posted on that status of your order and be available for help should the need arise. Description: All games are new and still in factory shrink-wrap. How to place an Order? Via the BoardGameGeek “shopping cart” Note: If this is your first purchase on BoardGameGeek, Go to http://boardgamegeek.com/wiki/page/Marketplace_Buyer_Guide for more information. Payment: Payment via PayPal “Griffin@GriffinsToyChest.com” (PayPal Verified) Shipping: Griffin’s Toy Chest ships via USPS (2-3 day service) or Fed-Ex Ground (2-5 business days) to anywhere within the United States. You will receive a price quote for each shipping option and you choose which of these two shipping option best fits your needs. All shipments are made within 2-3 days of receiving your cleared PayPal payment. Note: feel free to combine items to reduce shipping cost. Returns: Our return policy mirrors our philosophy; we are not satisfied unless you are satisfied! You may return any unopened item within 30 days of delivery for a full refund of the purchase price less shipping costs. Simply contact us to make return arrangements. Note: if an item is damaged in transit, an item exchange will be made at no additional cost to the buyer. Note that we take special pains to package all of your items properly but in the event of the unforeseen, we have you covered!
Contact: Please contact us via email: Griffin@GriffinsToyChest.com: phone (M-F 9 AM -6PM EST) 1-888-228-3716; or mail: Griffins Toy Chest, P.O. Box 13731, Fairlawn, OH 44313

The Game Master -- Cuba Language: Dutch 2 to 5 players 12 year and older Duration: 75 to 120 min New -- mint condition -- unopened -- still in shrink wrap. Weight: 1,870 kg Theme: CUBA is a strategic board game about booming trade in cigars, rum and exotic fruits. The many strategic possibilities make CUBA a vary diverse game. You can score points by keeping up the law, but on the other hand you can gain influence in parliament by buying votes! Use your connections in the harbour and build up a thriving plantation. Make good use of the tactical possibilities of erecting buildings and choose your characters wisely! See Details (more info) or below for complete selling, payment and shipping conditions.
